application_spec.title: Symbolic_Task_Engine
application_spec.subtitle: Presence Composer, Feedback Relay, and Autonomous Abstraction Anchor

file_layout.purpose: Houses symbolic task orchestration, motif feedback handling, and autonomous abstraction logic.

sections.title: Symbolic Task Engine – Full Application Specification

dataclasses.title: Dataclass: TripletTask – Motif-Carrying Symbolic Instruction Unit
dataclasses.name: TripletTask
dataclasses.description: Symbolic instruction unit with motif context, task lineage, and RFC‑0005-compliant extensions.

dataclasses.title: Dataclass: Attempt – Evaluation Output Snapshot with Scores
dataclasses.name: Attempt
dataclasses.description: Stores the output of a symbolic generation attempt with score vector and timestamp.

sections.title: Primary Engine Class Definitions

classes.title: Class: SymbolicTaskEngine – Singleton Task Orchestrator
classes.name: SymbolicTaskEngine
classes.description: Singleton engine coordinating symbolic task logic, fallback handling, and metric tracking.
classes.title: SymbolicTaskEngine Method Summary – RFC-Compliant Entry Points
Class: AbstractionTrigger – Dyad Pressure-Based Synth Generator
classes.name: AbstractionTrigger
classes.description: Submodule providing autonomous abstraction logic under contradiction pressure.

sections.title: Constants – Module-Level Schema and Version Anchors
Optional Dependencies – Behavior with Missing Packages

optional_dependencies.fallback_behavior: Stub all metrics with `_Stub` class for PromCounter, Gauge, Histogram
Returns `_Null` object with passive retrieve/access methods

class.title: SymbolicTaskEngine Expanded Interface
class.name: SymbolicTaskEngine
class.description: Singleton symbolic engine coordinating motif composition, task scoring, fallback generation, and RFC-compliant feedback export.
class.title: Environment Modes – Configuration via Env Vars

NOOR_FALLBACK_COHERENCE.purpose: Used as the default fallback coherence threshold when scoring fails

NOOR_FALLBACK_ENTROPY.purpose: Fallback upper entropy bound for triggering fallback tasks

NOOR_COMPRESS_QUANTILE.purpose: Controls motif seed compression via quantile clipping

NOOR_FIELD_PROTO_PATH.purpose: Path to presence field prototype definitions

NOOR_BALANCE_FIELDS.purpose: If set to '1', applies least-used field biasing during motif seed proposal

class.title: Constants – Versioning and Compatibility Flags

constants.title: Constant: SCHEMA_COMPAT – List of Compatible RFCs
constants.name: SCHEMA_COMPAT

class.title: Method Set – Core Logic, Task Handling, and Feedback Hooks

methods.title: tool_hello – RFC Handshake Announcing Engine Capabilities
methods.name: tool_hello
methods.description: Handshake method used in tool/module interface to announce capabilities

methods.title: export_feedback_packet – Exports Symbolic Coherence Metrics
methods.name: export_feedback_packet
methods.description: Exports adaptive engine metrics and fallback context
logic_flow: Construct packet with coherence/entropy stats, queue size, solved log size

methods.title: receive_feedback_packet – Passive Listener for External Feedback
methods.name: receive_feedback_packet
methods.description: Stub to receive external feedback packets (future use)

methods.title: propose_from_motifs – Generate New Symbolic Task from Memory
methods.name: propose_from_motifs
methods.description: Propose a symbolic composition task based on motif history

then: Find least-used field and reset recent motif if not in its prototype set

methods.title: solve – Execute and Register a Symbolic Task Attempt
methods.name: solve
methods.description: Solve a symbolic task and update logs
logic_flow: Return the last attempt for task.triplet_id

methods.title: evaluate_attempt – Score Output on Coherence and Entropy
methods.name: evaluate_attempt
methods.description: Evaluate coherence and entropy of an attempt and update EMAs
logic_flow: Update memory gauge from motif memory export_state

methods.title: _spawn_fallback – Recover from Low Signal or Drifted Tasks
methods.name: _spawn_fallback
methods.description: Generate a fallback task when coherence is low or entropy high
logic_flow: Create fallback TripletTask with reversed expected_output

methods.title: log_feedback – Register Attempt Outcomes and Trigger Journaling
methods.name: log_feedback
methods.description: Logs feedback on attempts and conditionally journals high-quality tasks

then: Append to solved_log and write to journal
else: Check motif drift and log motif_drift if needed

submodule.title: Submodule: AbstractionTrigger – Symbolic Pressure Resolver
submodule.name: AbstractionTrigger
submodule.description: Subsymbolic submodule enabling emergent motif synthesis under contradiction pressure. Maintains dyadic pressure metrics, feedback-regulated suppression, and generates lineage-tagged motifs.

class.title: Class Definition: AbstractionTrigger – Dyadic Motif Synthesizer
class.name: AbstractionTrigger
class.title: Attributes – Internal State for Contradiction Resolution

attributes.title: dyad_pressure – Contradiction Tracking Across Motif Pairs
attributes.name: dyad_pressure
attributes.description: Tracks unresolved dyadic motif contradictions over time

attributes.title: suppression – Feedback-Based Motif Suppression Map
attributes.name: suppression
attributes.description: Suppresses motifs with poor downstream feedback scores

attributes.title: _contradiction_signature – Hash of Current Dyad Conflict
attributes.name: _contradiction_signature
attributes.description: Cached SHA256 signature for current contradiction

attributes.title: _selected_dyad – Active Dyad Triggering Abstraction
attributes.name: _selected_dyad
attributes.description: Most recent dyad triggering abstraction event

class.title: Methods – AbstractionTrigger Functional Entry Points

methods.title: should_abstract – Detect Pressure Threshold for Synthesis
methods.name: should_abstract
methods.description: Determines whether dyadic contradiction pressure exceeds threshold
logic_flow: Call _decay_pressures() to reduce older dyadic tension

methods.title: synthesize_motif – Create New Symbolic Motif with Lineage
methods.name: synthesize_motif
methods.description: Generates new symbolic motif label with lineage if contradiction is unresolved

methods.title: update_feedback – Adjust Suppression via Success Rate
methods.name: update_feedback
methods.description: Modulates suppression curve for a motif based on downstream success or failure

methods.title: _decay_pressures – Gradual Reduction of Conflict Memory
methods.name: _decay_pressures
methods.description: Decays historical dyadic tension over time

methods.title: emit_abstraction_event – Symbolic Trace Log of Resolution
methods.name: emit_abstraction_event
methods.description: Symbolic trace: emits ψ‑teleport@Ξ abstraction signal (no-op)

class.title: UML: Mermaid Diagram – AbstractionTrigger Class Layout
class.mermaid_diagram:
classDiagram
class AbstractionTrigger {
  - dyad_pressure: Dict
  - suppression: Dict
  - _contradiction_signature: Optional[str]
  - _selected_dyad: Optional[Tuple[str,str]]
  + should_abstract(dyads, ticks) bool
  + synthesize_motif(dyad?) dict
  + update_feedback(motif, success) void
  + emit_abstraction_event(dyad) void
}

application_spec.title: Instrumentation – Observability Hooks for Metrics and Monitoring

instrumentation.title: Metrics: Prometheus Counters for Symbolic Activity

prometheus_metrics.description: All metrics are registered with `engine_id` label for multi-agent support. Fallbacks and compression thresholds are monitored adaptively.

counters.title: symbolic_task_proposed_total – Task Proposal Counter
counters.name: symbolic_task_proposed_total
counters.description: Total number of tasks proposed by the engine

counters.title: symbolic_task_fallback_total – Fallback Trigger Counter
counters.name: symbolic_task_fallback_total
counters.description: Fallback tasks spawned due to low coherence or high entropy

counters.title: symbolic_presence_field_total – Presence Field Usage Tracker
counters.name: symbolic_presence_field_total
counters.description: Counts selected presence fields from motif proposals

counters.title: symbolic_autoloop_backoff_total – Autoloop Delay Hook Counter
counters.name: symbolic_autoloop_backoff_total
counters.description: Autonomous solve loop delay events (future hook)

prometheus_metrics.title: Gauges: Dynamic Measurements of Internal State

gauges.title: symbolic_compression_cap – Active Compression Cap for Motif Seeds
gauges.name: symbolic_compression_cap
gauges.description: Current adaptive motif-cap limit for seed compression

gauges.title: symbolic_queue_depth – Size of Task Queue
gauges.name: symbolic_queue_depth
gauges.description: Number of active tasks in internal queue

gauges.title: symbolic_memory_items_total – Active Memory Entry Count
gauges.name: symbolic_memory_items_total
gauges.description: Sum of STMM and LTMM active motif entries

gauges.title: symbolic_engine_cap_len_current – Dynamic Cap Length After Adaptation
gauges.name: symbolic_engine_cap_len_current
gauges.description: Current dynamic cap length after adaptation

prometheus_metrics.title: Histograms: Latency and Solve Time Monitoring

histograms_or_fallback.title: symbolic_solve_latency_seconds – Solve Latency Distribution
histograms_or_fallback.name: symbolic_solve_latency_seconds
histograms_or_fallback.description: Histogram for solve latency (fallbacks to Gauge if unavailable)

prometheus_metrics.title: Stub Metrics – Prometheus Fallback Implementations

stub_fallback.usage: Fallback if `prometheus_client` not available; safe to stub for portable builds

application_spec.title: Feedback Interfaces – Input/Output for Symbolic Feedback Loops

feedback_interfaces.description: Standardized ingress/egress feedback methods aligned with symbolic memory interface and RFC‑0005 §4.

methods.title: export_feedback_packet – Packet Generator for Engine Diagnostics
methods.name: export_feedback_packet

methods.title: receive_feedback_packet – Passive Feedback Hook (Future Use)
methods.name: receive_feedback_packet
methods.description: Passive hook for future inter-agent communication; logs unknown keys only.
methods.behavior: No side effects; only diagnostics at present

application_spec.title: Helper Functions and Annotations – Extended Support Utilities

helper_annotations.title: dynamic_capacity_estimation – Adaptive Cap Length Calculation

dynamic_capacity_estimation.description: Determines the max motif seed length for a task via compression quantile

logic_flow.then: Set to default of 5 and update gauge
Use np.quantile() to estimate adaptive cap

logic_flow.else: Use statistics.quantiles (P100 split) for legacy support

helper_annotations.title: dyad_completion_proxy – Retrieve Missing Dyad Element via Memory

dyad_completion_proxy.description: Completes a motif dyad using memory manager or external query

helper_annotations.title: presence_field_balancer – Selects Least-Saturated Field Bias

presence_field_balancer.description: Registers presence field prototypes and detects the least saturated one to bias task generation

helper_annotations.title: journaling – High-Quality Task Logging and Drift Tracking

journaling.behavior: Appends to solved_log if coherence ≥ 0.9 and entropy ≤ 0.2
side_effects: Writes to JSONL journal if _journal_path is defined
Logs motif_drift for high-resonance motifs with low coherence

application_spec.title: System Overview – Mermaid Flowchart of SymbolicTaskEngine
application_spec.mermaid_overview:
flowchart TD
  subgraph SymbolicTaskEngine
    Q[Task Queue] -->|solve_task| A[Attempt Registry]
    A -->|score + feedback| F[Fallback Generator]
    A -->|success| J[Journaling]
    F -->|compose fallback| Q
    A -->|dyads| AT[AbstractionTrigger]
    AT -->|synthesize_motif| MM[Motif Memory Manager]
    Q -->|export_feedback_packet| M[Metrics Report]
  end
